# Images Directory

This directory contains images used in the GitHub Pages exercise steps.

## Images

- `celebration-constructocat.svg` - Celebration image used in the review step
  - Created as a placeholder since the original Octodex image (https://octodex.github.com/images/constructocat2.jpg) couldn't be automatically downloaded
  - Can be replaced with the original JPG if desired by downloading from https://octodex.github.com/constructocat-v2/
